name: Ferienhof Hotel Garni Oblasser
description: Our house is the ideal holiday destination in summer or winter - whether travelling alone, or as a couple, or with the entire family. To get your day off to a good start, we will pamper you in the mornings with an extensive breakfast buffet with products from our own farm. You can also relax on our terrace or sunbathe in the garden. A favourite meeting point in our house is the guest lounge or the house bar, with an open chimney. You have the choice between comfortable rooms with bath/shower/WC that have a safe, Sat-tv and a balcony, or fully equipped holiday apartments for 3-4 persons.

Children up to the age of 6 go free, up to the age of 12 a 50% price reduction.
Includes: Heating, garage, water, electricity, local taxes and bed linen.
Excludes: End cleaning charge.

Use the B169 - at the roundabout in Mayrhofen drive straight ahead, past the railway station, and along the ring road in the direction of Hintertux. At the junction for Hintertux drive 300m straight on until you reach signs for our holiday house. Turn right, and you will be able to see us in the middle of a field.

makesOffer.name: Double room, shower, toilet
makesOffer.description:
Comfortably furnished double room with balcony, well equipped, shower/WC, Sat-TV, safe, telephone, radio;
Children's price reductions!

itemOffered.name: SKISTART, Doppelzimmer mit Dusche, WC, 30 Quadratm
itemOffered.description:
SKI START Package
available from 05.12. - 19.12.2015
- 7 nights with breakfast buffet, tourist tax, spa
- all amenities of the Ferienhof Oblasser 
- 6-day super ski pass including glacier
- Package price € 530.-- per person
